items.sentence: Did you tell Tom what you were planning to do?
Tom will be home from school in about an hour.
Tom was scared to go into the cave by himself.
Tom gave a sleeping bag to me a few weeks ago.
It isn't good for scientists to get emotional.
I don't think anybody else noticed you crying.
Tom is shorter and weighs much less than Mary.
If we can't stop them, then what should we do?
Clearly, you don't understand what's going on.
Every time I come here, I learn something new.
